name: Spinach Mushroom Pesto Spaghetti 🥗
description: This pasta dish is packed with flavorful ingredients like sautéed mushrooms, spinach, and homemade pesto sauce.
instructions: Add the mushrooms, salt, and pepper cooking until most of the water is gone.
Add the spaghetti, and toss until evenly coated, with the sauce sticking to the noodles.
